meanings.definition: A long, thin board used in construction to create walls.
meanings.sent1: The workers carried the wallboards to the construction site.
meanings.sent2: The wallboards were stacked neatly against the wall.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to climb the wallboards but slipped and fell.
meanings.sent4: The wallboards stood tall like soldiers guarding the room.
meanings.sent5: The sound of hammering echoed through the house as the wallboards were put in place.

meanings.definition: A type of material used to cover walls in a building.
meanings.sent1: The interior designer chose colorful wallboards for the office walls.
meanings.sent2: The wallboards added a modern touch to the room.
meanings.sent3: The wallboards seemed to change color under different lighting.
meanings.sent4: The wallboards whispered stories of the past to those who listened.
meanings.sent5: The touch of the smooth wallboards was comforting to the fingertips.
